price: 33. Kee nummayse maraaw! Yalla oggolaay, Yallih-farmoyta oggolaay, taamoomi sinnik mabaysina.
arabic: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبۡطِلُوٓاْ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla walā tub'ṭilū aʿmālakum
